lines.text: [after fantasizing about pleasuring her younger co-worker David in the office]

[thinking]
What am I? A dirty old woman? He's young enough to be my... my brother.
[in David's car after Christy previously refused an affair because David is married]
Don't forget that you promised me something tonight, David.
Yeah, I know what you thought I said. But it doesn't mean I still can't touch you.
